summary: When a tycoon is accused of murder, the private eye tracking him finds himself roped in as an accessory and attempts to evade police, kidnapping a poetess along the way.
cast: Claudette Colbert|James Stewart|Guy Kibbee|Nat Pendleton|Frances Drake|Edgar Kennedy|Ernest Truex|Richard Carle|Cecilia Callejo|Sidney Blackmer|Andy Clyde|Cliff Clark|Cecil Cunningham|Leonard Kibrick|Hans Conried|Grady Sutton|Lowden Adams|Murray Alper|Monya Andre|Lulu Mae Bohrman|Harry Burns|George Chandler|Frank Coghlan Jr.|Hal Cooke|Maurice Costello|Rae Daggett|Daisy|Edgar Dearing|John Dilson|Peter Du Rey|Rex Evans|Frank Faylen|Jack Gardner|Tom Hanlon|Harold Hoff|Mike Lally|W.E. Lawrence|Wally Maher|Fay McKenzie|Malcolm 'Bud' McTaggart|George Meeker|Harold Miller|Alberto Morin|Philip Morris|Jack Mulhall|Louis Natheaux|Jack Raymond|Mary Louise Smith|Brick Sullivan|William Tannen|Phillip Terry|Monte Vandergrift|Ray Walker
keywords: private detective|heir|newspaper headline|breach of promise suit|revolving door
director: Director: W.S. Van Dyke (as W.S. Van Dyke II)
title: En este mundo traidor
